channel.title: Rock Paper Scissors
channel.description:
Well, here's my version of Rock Paper Scissors.
Readme.txt [code] Well, if you're reading this, you've obviously downloaded my Rock Paper Scissors program which I posted. Good for you <3
Feedback is ultra highly appreciated.
Anyway, enjoy <3.
You may redistribute this, heck, what do I care. But, credits would be nice, but are not needed. [/code]
Oh, this uses a command window. I'm working on a GUI based one. Or better yet, struggling on a GUI based one.
Anyway...
Enjoy, Yz85Racer.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 04:14:18 AM[/size][hr]Made a little update and fixed a little bug I mistyped :P
